rules:
    info-title-in-kebab-case:
        given: $.info.title
            function: pattern
                match: ^[a-z][a-z0-9\-]*$
        type: style
        recommended: true
            :
            :
        message: Error in the format of the api title
        description: Error in the format of the api title must be in kebab-case
        severity: error
            :
            :
